note:
hi there hello! i'm just some nerdy androgyne enby from the puget sound area. currently studying film and working part time in accessibility. pls write my name in all lowercase!

interests:
artix + s6 + cosmic is my drug of choice but currently driving bazziteos on deck, i'm about as close as you can be to a programmer without actually being one. favorite games are portal 2 and oneshot (hmu if you need achievements on either), i listen to a lot of electronic music (wayyyy too much deadmau5). i support urbanism/public transit and take da bus every day.

boundaries:
may rarely post somewhat lewd/adult stuff under a proper cw, all ages can follow as long as you don't interact with that stuff if you're not an adult, follow requests are welcome but subject to vibe check, compliments cool but don't flirt if i don't know you that well.

be excellent to eachother, and party on
pfp by meltyloo if he were evil
